Ingredients

  • Two fresh avocados
  • Two ripe limes
  • An onion

Instructions

  1. Grill the chicken
  2. Pour into tortilla
  3. Add guacamole, sour cream and cheese
    1. Grill the chicken
    2. Pour into tortilla
    3. Add guacamole, sour cream and cheese
    4. Roll tortilla and serve
  4. Roll tortilla and serve

Definitions

Avocado
Pear-shaped fruit native to Central Mexico.
Guacamole
An avocado-based sauce that originated with the Aztecs in Mexico.
